DataElement.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Mood 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of their mood in the past seven days, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Questionnaire Most Important Issues Past 7 Days Mood
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients._A question about a person's most important health issues._The most recent week, including today._A relatively temporary state of feeling.

ObjectClass.preferredName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Concepts.longName: University of Washington Quality of Life Scale, Version 4
Concepts.definition: A questionnaire designed to assess health-related quality of life in head and neck cancer patients.

Property.preferredName: Most Important Issue Past Week Mood
Property.preferredDefinition: A question about a person's most important health issues.:The most recent week, including today.:A relatively temporary state of feeling.

Concepts.definition: A question about a person's most important health issues.
The most recent week. May include the present day.
A relatively temporary state of feeling.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard of five responses from mood is not affected by cancer to extremely depressed about cancer.

PermissibleValues.value: I am extremely depressed about my cancer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is extremely depressed about their cancer.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is extremely depressed about their cancer.

PermissibleValues.value: I am somewhat depressed about my cancer.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is somewhat depressed about their cancer.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is somewhat depressed about their cancer.

PermissibleValues.value: I am neither in a good mood nor depressed about my cancer.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Neither in a Good Mood nor Depressed About My Cancer

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Neither in a Good Mood nor Depressed About My Cancer
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is neither in a good mood nor depressed about their cancer.

Concepts.longName: Neither in a Good Mood nor Depressed About My Cancer
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is neither in a good mood nor depressed about their cancer.

PermissibleValues.value: My mood is generally good and only occasionally affected by my cancer.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Mood is Generally Good and Only Occasionally Affected by Cancer

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Mood is Generally Good and Only Occasionally Affected by Cancer
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is in generally good mood, only occasionally affected by their cancer.

Concepts.longName: Mood is Generally Good and Only Occasionally Affected by Cancer
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is in generally good mood, only occasionally affected by their cancer.

PermissibleValues.value: My mood is excellent and unaffected by my cancer.
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Mood is Excellent and Unaffected by Cancer

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Mood is Excellent and Unaffected by Cancer
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is in excellent mood unaffected by their cancer.

Concepts.longName: Mood is Excellent and Unaffected by Cancer
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is in excellent mood unaffected by their cancer.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
